ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup dark roast ground coffee beans

cookingTips: Use a traditional Vietnamese phin filter for authentic taste and experience
Brew slowly—let hot water drip through grounds gradually for best extraction
Stir condensed milk into the glass before adding brewed coffee
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Vietnamese coffee is about patience and technique. The traditional phin method produces a rich, concentrated coffee. Balance the strong coffee with sweet condensed milk to taste.
